snippet.title: Nighborn Announcement
snippet.description:
Announcing "Nightborn" an Action RPG being developed by Occupational Hazard LLC in Unreal Engine 5. David Tveraas, Lead Designer, discusses the project in this video. 

Epic Games Page: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/nightborn-e35c72
Steam Page: [Pending Approval] 
Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/nightborn/nightborn
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/c/OccupationalHazard
Discord: https://discord.gg/Z78uaQrxFJ

Transcript: 

"Greetings Creatures of the Night, 

I am David Tveraas, Unreal Engine 5 Game Designer and Worldbuilder.

It is with Great excitement and aplomb that I announce the development of Nightborn, an original IP Action RPG inspired by legendary games such as Deus Ex, Vampire: The Masquerade – Bloodlines, and Fallout: New Vegas.
 
Nightborn takes place in a Gothic version of our own world where you assume the role of a Vampire Detective known in vampire society as a Bloodhound. You will fight, sneak, and charm your way through the New Orleans underworld, to unravel a vast conspiracy involving vampire factions, werewolves, and far stranger supernatural creatures.  You will have to use your powers, gather allies, and solve mysteries if you wish to survive without losing yourself to madness or damnation. 

Nightborn includes the following features:
• Character Creation where you may choose to be descended from one of 10 ancient vampire lineages with their own identities and combination of dark powers
• Lineage Powers include unnatural physical prowess, shapeshifting, controlling the minds of mortals, and blasphemous acts of eldritch sorcery.
• As a vampire you must fuel your powers by preying upon mortals via stealth, seduction, or brute force. 
• To mask your dark nature, you must elude mortal law enforcement and monster hunters.
• Solving the mysteries of gothic New Orleans will require taking quests, discovering clues, and exploring the supernatural underworld.
• It would not be a vampire tale without underworld politics. You may side with the various Nightborn factions, such as the Ruling Establishment, the Reckless Libertines, the Fanatical Orthodoxy, or eschew them all to forge your own path.  
• Connect with your dwindling humanity by engaging with mortals, recovering lost faith, or dancing in New Orleans Night Clubs.

You may support Nightborn by spreading the word about the project to your friends and on social media. Become a Patron on Patreon, joins our Discord server, and stay tuned for an upcoming Kickstarter Crowdfunding Campaign. See links below.

It is through your support that Nightborn will be created. Please participate in the community and let your voice be heard. Farewell, Nightborn. "
